DOC.brief_summary: To compare efficacy safety EC-T ET regimen adjuvant treatment breast cancer patient positive lymph node
DOC.brief_title: Regimens Comparison Breast Cancers Positive Lymph Nodes
DOC.detailed_description: EC-T regimen : epirubicin 90mg/m2 day1 , CTX 600mg/m2 , day 1 , 21 day per cycle *4cycle . follow paclitaxel 175mg/m2 , d1,21days per cycle , 4 cycle . ET regimen : epirubicin 75mg/m2 day1 , paclitaxel 175mg/m2 , d2,21days per cycle , 6 cycle
DOC.criteria: patient breast cancer breast cancer surgery positive lymph node age 1870 year old malignance disease
